column2: The needle was inserted into the testis at a distance from any focal lesion to allow more room for manoeuvre, and to theoretically reduce any risk of tumour cell seeding and contamination of the skin (Fig. 1). Biopsy (18G; single pass) [2 years] 4 49 Right testicular painless swelling Right testis grossly enlarged by diffuse Diffuse large B-cell No other sites involved. Garcia-Solano J, Sanchez-Sanchez C, Montalban-Romero S, Sola-Perez J, Perez-Guillermo M (1998) Fine needle aspiration of testicular germ cell tumours; a 10-year experience in a community hospital.
